cases.claim: Lionel Messi is statistically the greatest footballer of all time
cases.label: INSUFFICIENT

evidence_packets.summary: Messi holds records for most Ballon d'Ors (8) and most goals in a calendar year (91)
Pele scored 1,281 goals including unofficial matches; Messi trails in World Cup goals-per-game to Klose

cases.claim: VAR has reduced refereeing errors by over 80%
cases.label: REFUTED

evidence_packets.summary: IFAB report shows match-changing errors reduced from 7% to 1.1% in top leagues
Fan surveys show 48% believe VAR introduces new types of errors and delays

cases.claim: The European Super League would have destroyed domestic leagues
cases.label: INSUFFICIENT

evidence_packets.summary: Economic modelling by Deloitte showed 15-25% revenue drop for mid-table clubs
EU Court of Justice ruled UEFA monopoly restrictions partly unlawful

cases.claim: Qatar 2022 was the most-watched FIFA World Cup in history
cases.label: SUPPORTED

evidence_packets.summary: FIFA reported 5.4 billion cumulative TV viewers, surpassing Russia 2018's 3.6B
Messi-Mbappe final attracted 1.5 billion live viewers

cases.claim: Premier League clubs outspent all other leagues combined in 2023
cases.label: REFUTED

evidence_packets.summary: PL spent £2.8B; LaLiga, Serie A, Bundesliga, Ligue 1 combined spent £3.1B
PL represents 42% of global transfer spend, highest single league

cases.claim: La Masia has produced more international players than any other academy
cases.label: SUPPORTED

evidence_packets.summary: La Masia graduates include 68 active international players across 22 nations
Ajax academy trails at 52 active internationals

cases.claim: NFL concussion rates have dropped 25% since 2015 protocol changes
cases.label: SUPPORTED

evidence_packets.summary: NFL Health & Safety report shows diagnosed concussions dropped from 271 (2015) to 187 (2023)
Critics argue underreporting remains a significant factor

cases.claim: NFL salary cap promotes competitive balance better than European football
cases.label: SUPPORTED

evidence_packets.summary: 14 different NFL teams reached the Super Bowl in last 10 years vs 6 different CL winners
Gini coefficient of win distribution is 0.12 in NFL vs 0.31 in Premier League

cases.claim: Expected goals (xG) is a better predictor of future results than actual goals scored
cases.label: SUPPORTED

evidence_packets.summary: StatsBomb analysis shows xG has higher correlation with next-season points than current-season goals
xG predicted Leicester's 2016 regression more accurately than pundits

cases.claim: Women's World Cup 2023 viewership doubled compared to 2019
cases.label: REFUTED

evidence_packets.summary: Global viewership reached 2 billion in 2023, up from 1.12B in 2019 (~79% increase)
US viewership actually declined due to time zone challenges

cases.claim: High-pressing teams win significantly more matches in top European leagues
cases.label: SUPPORTED

evidence_packets.summary: Top-5 PPDA teams won 62% of matches vs 45% for bottom-5 in 2022-23
Correlation between PPDA and points is -0.41 (moderate) in EPL

cases.claim: New stadium builds generate positive ROI within 10 years
cases.label: INSUFFICIENT

evidence_packets.summary: Tottenham's new stadium increased matchday revenue by 45% but debt service high
Economist studies show public-funded stadiums rarely achieve positive ROI

cases.claim: Penalty shootouts are essentially random coin flips
cases.label: REFUTED

evidence_packets.summary: Teams shooting first win 60% of shootouts in World Cups
Goalkeeper preparation and psychological factors significantly influence outcomes

cases.claim: Modern footballers' careers last 3 years longer than in the 1990s
cases.label: SUPPORTED

evidence_packets.summary: Average retirement age in top-5 leagues rose from 31.2 to 34.1 between 1995 and 2023
Sports science, nutrition, and load management cited as primary factors

cases.claim: Semi-automated offside technology is accurate to within 1cm
cases.label: SUPPORTED

evidence_packets.summary: FIFA's Hawk-Eye system uses 12 cameras tracking 29 body points per player at 50fps
Independent validation showed margin of error at 1.3cm in match conditions

cases.claim: Fantasy football participation exceeds 60 million in North America
cases.label: SUPPORTED

evidence_packets.summary: Fantasy Sports & Gaming Association estimates 62.5 million players in US and Canada
NFL.com alone hosts 18 million active fantasy leagues

cases.claim: Diving has increased in football despite VAR introduction
cases.label: REFUTED

evidence_packets.summary: Yellow cards for simulation rose briefly in 2018 but declined 30% by 2023
VAR overturned 38 penalty decisions due to diving in 2022-23 EPL season

cases.claim: MLS average attendance surpassed Serie A in 2023
cases.label: SUPPORTED

evidence_packets.summary: MLS averaged 22,631 per match in 2023; Serie A averaged 21,867
Messi's Inter Miami move boosted away attendance by 40% alone

cases.claim: The traditional number 10 playmaker role is extinct in modern football
cases.label: REFUTED

evidence_packets.summary: Players like Odegaard, De Bruyne, and Bellingham operate as advanced playmakers regularly
The role has evolved but not disappeared; 14 of 20 PL teams field a nominal no. 10

cases.claim: The gap between rich and poor clubs widened by 50% in the last decade
cases.label: SUPPORTED

evidence_packets.summary: Top-10 revenue clubs earned €8.9B vs bottom-50 earning €1.2B in 2023 (ratio 7.4:1 vs 5.1:1 in 2013)
Revenue sharing mechanisms remain inadequate in most European leagues
